Package jsim.variate

The variate package provides numerous classes for generating random variates.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Bernoulli Bernoulli random variate generation.
Beta Beta random variate generation.
Binomial Binomial random variate generation.
Cauchy Cauchy random variate generation.
ChiSquare Chi-Square (n degrees of freedom) random variate generation.
DiscreteProb Discrete probability random variate generation.
Erlang Erlang random variate generation.
Exponential Exponential random variate generation.
F_Distribution F-Distribution random variate generation.
Gamma Gamma random variate generation.
GenNames Generate a list of all variate names.
Geometric Geometric random variate generation.
HyperExponential Generate a hyperexponentially distributed random number mean mu and standard deviation sigma (sigma > mu) using Morse's two-stage hyperexponential distribution.
HyperGeometric Generate a random number from the hypergeometric distribution with population m, number of drawn items n and probability of success p.
LCGRandom Basic random number generator.
LogNormal Log Normal random variate generation.
NegativeBinomial Negative Binomial random variate generation.
Normal Normal random variate generation.
Poisson Poisson (with mean mu) random variate generation.
Randi Random Integer (Discrete Uniform) random variate generation.
StudentT Student t random variate generation.
Triangular Triangular random variate generation.
Uniform Uniform random variate generation in which variates are constructed based upon a mean and an interval half width.
Uniform2 Uniform random variate generation in which variates are constructed by specifying the lower and upper bounds.
Variate Random number generation via an installable random number generator.
VarNames Class listing names of all variates.
Weibull Weibull random variate generation.
 

Package jsim.variate Description

The variate package provides numerous classes for generating random variates.
